name: CAERNARVON TOWNSHIP (BERKS COUNTY) ZONING HEARING BOARD, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania HUMAN RELATIONS COMMISSION, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of February, 2004, the order of the Commonwealth Court is Affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
